lexa.core.data.formatting

Class CombinedFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • lexa.core.data.formatting.CombinedFormat

  • public class CombinedFormat
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper for serialising data values.

    An instance provides references to all the formats. This is to circumvent having multiple references in the code base where multiple types are required.

    Since:
    2013-08
    Author:
    William
